## SendableEthersStabilio.approveXbrlStblUniTokens() method

Allow the liquidity mining contract to use Uniswap XBRL/STBL LP tokens for [staking](./lib-base.transactablestabilio.stakexbrlstblunitokens.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
approveXbrlStblUniTokens(allowance?: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<SentEthersStabilioTransaction<void>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  allowance | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum amount of LP tokens that will be transferrable to liquidity mining (<code>2^256 - 1</code> by default). |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentEthersStabilioTransaction](./lib-ethers.sentethersstabiliotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;void&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Must be performed before calling [stakeXbrlStblUniTokens()](./lib-base.transactablestabilio.stakexbrlstblunitokens.md)<!-- -->.
